Official page, just remove ! after dots(".").

I can't install I get error "access violation at address 0040CC7 in module 'setup.tmp'. Read of address 0000000."
help?

Try to click on setup with your right mouse button and click "Run as administrator".
http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/4103/raa.png
Oh brother. The only menu options are "No Steam", which of course doesn't do anything, and "Quit".

If you're experiencing problems installing with Windows XP OS, then go to the http://cs.@rin.@ru/forum/viewtopic.@php?f=32&t=61505
official page, just remove @ after dots(".").
im not sure why but i can't find the file name /portal2gamedir/ to copy the steamclient.dll to
im also getting the same messege that weilku was getting and i did try running it as administrator and still same thing

To hellsfury1989 and all others:

Download the fix from here!!!

http://cs.@rin.@ru/forum/viewtopic.@php?p=787005#p787005

Just copy & paste URL removing @ and download the fix from there.
